message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While $200 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $170 to make this a deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $140?
